segment.source: Settings for Automating OOBE
segment.target: Settings for Automating OOBE

segment.source: Settings for Automating OOBE
segment.target: Settings for Automating OOBE

segment.source: You can prevent some or all of the user interface (UI) pages from appearing in Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE).
segment.target: You can prevent some or all of the user interface (UI) pages from appearing in Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE).

segment.source: Automating OOBE
segment.target: Automating OOBE

segment.source: To automate OOBE, add the following settings to your unattended Setup answer file:
segment.target: To automate OOBE, add the following settings to your unattended Setup answer file:

segment.source: Setting
segment.target: Setting

segment.source: Configuration pass
segment.target: Configuration pass

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-International-Core settings: InputLocale, SystemLocale, UILanguage, and UserLocale.
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-International-Core settings: InputLocale, SystemLocale, UILanguage, and UserLocale.

segment.source: oobeSystem
segment.target: oobeSystem

segment.source: Specifies the region-specific defaults of the Windows installation.
segment.target: Specifies the region-specific defaults of the Windows installation.

segment.source: Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education) and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 for desktop editions (Home, Pro, Enterprise, and Education) and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | ComputerName
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | ComputerName

segment.source: specialize
segment.target: specialize

segment.source: Specifies the computer's name to apply to the Windows installation.
segment.target: Specifies the computer's name to apply to the Windows installation.

segment.source: If ComputerName is set to an asterisk (*) or is an empty string, a random computer name will be generated.
segment.target: If ComputerName is set to an asterisk (*) or is an empty string, a random computer name will be generated.

segment.source: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | UserAccounts: Add an account and a password.
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | UserAccounts: Add an account and a password.

segment.source: oobeSystem
segment.target: oobeSystem

segment.source: Specifies the user accounts to create on the Windows installation.
segment.target: Specifies the user accounts to create on the Windows installation.

segment.source: The account can be a user account, a domain account, or the default administrator account.
segment.target: The account can be a user account, a domain account, or the default administrator account.

segment.source: Though you must enter a password, the password may be blank.
segment.target: Though you must enter a password, the password may be blank.

segment.source: To enter a blank password, in Windows SIM, right-click Value, and select Write Empty String.
segment.target: To enter a blank password, in Windows SIM, right-click Value, and select Write Empty String.

segment.source: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | (HideEULAPage, HideOEMRegistrationScreen, HideOnlineAccountScreens, and HideWirelessSetupInOOBE)
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | (HideEULAPage, HideOEMRegistrationScreen, HideOnlineAccountScreens, and HideWirelessSetupInOOBE)

segment.source: oobeSystem
segment.target: oobeSystem

segment.source: Specifies the behavior of some OOBE screens.
segment.target: Specifies the behavior of some OOBE screens.

segment.source: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | HideLocalAccountScreen
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | HideLocalAccountScreen

segment.source: oobeSystem
segment.target: oobeSystem

segment.source: Specifies whether end users must set the Administrator password screen that appears during OOBE.
segment.target: Specifies whether end users must set the Administrator password screen that appears during OOBE.

segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview only
segment.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview only

segment.source: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | ProtectYourPC
segment.target: Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup | OOBE | ProtectYourPC

segment.source: oobeSystem
segment.target: oobeSystem

segment.source: Specifies whether your device is configured with Express settings, such as sending data to Microsoft, letting Windows and apps request the user's localization, and turning on protection against malicious web content.
segment.target: Specifies whether your device is configured with Express settings, such as sending data to Microsoft, letting Windows and apps request the user's localization, and turning on protection against malicious web content.

segment.source: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows 10 for desktop editions and Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
